thread.title: Eddy
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop betygsatt av Eddy

author: Eddy
title: Eddy
text:
Ecco has great products, that's undeniable, but what i discovered is that this is accompanied by an excellent customer service.
Friendly as well as easy to reach and very proactive.
A special thanks to Magadalena in support, who was somehow able to answer my questions before i could even ask them :)
Great job !!!
